name: Philosophies of Diligence
desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

value.text:

customize.name: Philosophies of Diligence
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Guide to Diligence
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

customize.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
customize.desc: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

customize.name: Hu Tao
customize.desc: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

customize.name: Traveler (Geo)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Lan Yan
customize.desc: A rattan weaver from Chenyu Vale. Clear-minded and well-tempered, she is as lively as a mountain spring.

customize.name: Yaoyao
customize.desc: Streetward Rambler's youngest disciple. A gentle and caring "little adult."

customize.name: Yun Jin
customize.desc: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

customize.name: Chongyun
customize.desc: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

customize.name: Teachings of Diligence
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Diligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.

customize.name: Guide to Diligence
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.
